title: Midnight Heir
author: Samantha Reed
description: A powerful CEO discovers his heart when he meets a struggling artist who refuses his money. Their forbidden romance sparks passion and danger.

title: The Billionaire's Vow
author: Eleanor Grace
description: After a tragic past, a reclusive billionaire finds hope in an unexpected love that challenges his guarded heart.

title: Fortune's Embrace
author: Victoria Lane
description: A woman inherits a fortune but must navigate the dangerous world of high society and a mysterious benefactor.

title: The Tycoon's Temptation
author: Sophia Bell
description: A business rivalry turns into a passionate affair when two powerful CEOs are forced to work together.

title: Millionaire's Mistake
author: Olivia Hart
description: One night changes everything when a wealthy man discovers he has a child from a past relationship.

title: Blood Oath
author: Marcus Kane
description: A woman caught in the crossfire of a mafia war becomes the obsession of a dangerous don who will protect her at all costs.

title: Mafia's Honor
author: Carmen Vega
description: To save her family, she agrees to marry the most feared mafia boss in the city.

title: Don's Desire
author: Luca Romano
description: She was supposed to be his enemy, but their attraction is stronger than their families' hatred.

title: Sinful Allegiance
author: Isabella Rossi
description: An undercover cop infiltrates the mafia and falls for the boss she's supposed to bring down.

title: Mafia's Redemption
author: Dante Moretti
description: A ruthless mafia boss seeks redemption through the love of an innocent woman who sees his humanity.

title: Luna's Call
author: Elena Moon
description: A woman discovers she's the mate of a powerful werewolf alpha when she moves to a mysterious mountain town.

title: Alpha's Claim
author: Derek Wolf
description: As the new alpha, he must claim his mate to secure his pack's future, but she resists his primal pull.

title: Moonbound
author: Selena Night
description: She's a lone wolf who's never belonged, until she meets a pack that ignites something primal within her.

title: Howl of Desire
author: Kane Wilder
description: Their packs are at war, but their bodies and souls recognize each other as true mates.

title: Wolf's Heart
author: Luna Grey
description: A human woman discovers she's a rare wolf whisperer who can calm even the most feral werewolves.

title: Young Love
author: Emma Taylor
description: Two high school seniors navigate first love, friendship, and the challenges of growing up.

title: Teen Hearts
author: Jake Wilson
description: A shy bookworm and a popular athlete find common ground through their shared love of music.

title: High School Crush
author: Lily Chen
description: After years apart, childhood friends reunite in high school and rediscover their feelings.

title: Prom Night
author: Tyler Reed
description: One night can change everything when secrets are revealed at the senior prom.

title: Summer Fling
author: Maya Rodriguez
description: A summer romance turns serious when two teens from different worlds fall deeply in love.

title: Magic Kingdom
author: Arthur Pendragon
description: A young orphan discovers he's the heir to a magical kingdom and must master his powers to defeat an ancient evil.

title: Dragon's Legacy
author: Merlin Blackwood
description: The last dragon rider must awaken the ancient dragons to save the world from darkness.

title: Elven Prophecy
author: Luna Silverleaf
description: A half-elf must fulfill an ancient prophecy to unite the fractured elven clans.

title: Wizard's Oath
author: Gandor the Wise
description: A young wizard must choose between loyalty to his order and love for a forbidden sorceress.

title: Fae Realm
author: Titania Nightshade
description: A mortal woman is pulled into the dangerous world of fae politics and forbidden romance.

title: Forbidden Desires
author: Scarlett Wilde
description: A steamy office romance between a powerful CEO and his new assistant escalates into a passionate affair.

title: Midnight Passion
author: Luna Night
description: A chance encounter at a masquerade ball leads to a night of forbidden passion.

title: Secret Lover
author: Damon Black
description: She's his brother's fiance, but their secret affair threatens to destroy everything.

title: Burning Desire
author: Jade Fire
description: A passionate romance between a firefighter and the woman he rescued from a burning building.

title: Seduction Game
author: Victor Steele
description: A high-stakes game of seduction between two rivals turns into a passionate affair.

title: Love Unbound
author: Alex Morgan
description: Two men from different worlds find love in a small town that challenges their relationship.

title: Rainbow Hearts
author: Jamie Taylor
description: A non-binary artist finds love with a genderqueer musician in the vibrant city of New York.

title: Pride and Love
author: Casey Reed
description: During Pride Month, two women from rival LGBTQ+ organizations fall in love despite their differences.

title: Transcendent Love
author: Taylor James
description: A transgender woman finds acceptance and love with a supportive partner who sees her true self.

title: Queer Hearts
author: Riley Chen
description: A polyamorous relationship explores love, trust, and boundaries in a modern romance.
